notEnoughChars: You must enter at least @chars characters!
ariaNavigatedToSolution: Navigated to newly included sample solution after textarea.

taskDescription: Jai Company has total liabilities of $200,000 and total stockholder equity of $300,000. What is the debt-to-equity ratio for Jai Company, and what can we infer about the firm using this ratio?
